holidays.title: Slap Your Annoying Coworker Day
holidays.description: If someone at work is bugging you, don't be shy — take advantage.

holidays.title: Hungarian Republic Day
holidays.description: Learn about the 1956 Hungarian Revolution that led to the creation of the Republic of Hungary.

holidays.title: Hungary Republic Day
holidays.description: Grab a seat as we inform you about Hungary’s national holiday, Hungary Republic Day!

holidays.title: International Swallows Depart from San Juan Capistrano Day
holidays.description: Let us witness and admire the beauty of thousands of swallows taking to the sky.

holidays.title: Libya Liberation Day
holidays.description: Learn how to honor the Libyan people and their struggle for freedom from Muammar Gaddafi's regime.

holidays.title: Masskara Festival
holidays.description: Join the annual and colorful MassKara Festival! Have fun partying on the streets of Bacolod, Philippines.

holidays.title: National Boston Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: We know what you’re thinking: Why is it called a pie, when it’s actually a cake?

holidays.title: National Croc Day
holidays.description: Crocs are making a comeback, and why not? They’re versatile, vibrant, and most of all, comfortable.

holidays.title: National iPod Day
holidays.description: Dust off your old iPod and pretend it’s the early 2000s all over again.

holidays.title: National Mole Day
holidays.description: It’s a basic chemistry algorithm, and not about those funny looking creatures called moles.

holidays.title: National Mother-in-Law Day
holidays.description: These “second moms” are always there to help, contribute, and, sometimes, lovingly criticize.

holidays.title: National One United Race Day
holidays.description: See what you can do to support National One United Race Day.

holidays.title: National Paralegal Day
holidays.description: Attorneys depend greatly on these men and women to get things right.

holidays.title: National Tight Ends Day
holidays.description: America honors one of the game's most important yet unappreciated positions, the tight end.

holidays.title: Newport Wales Marathon
holidays.description: Get ready to explore the Newport Wales Marathon — held at one of the U.K's flattest tracks.

holidays.title: T.V. Talk Show Host Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the T.V. talk show hosts who fill our evenings with warmth and laughter

holidays.title: Amandla Stenberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s Amandla Stenberg’s birthday! Celebrate her and all her nuggets of wisdom.

holidays.title: Arii’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Instagram star and TikTok sensation is a rising star and we're celebrating her today!

holidays.title: Asahd Khaled’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s Asahd Khaled’s birthday! With amazing parents, we’re sure he’ll grow up to be amazing, too!

holidays.title: Carter Sharer’s Birthday
holidays.description: From vlogging to D.I.Y. videos, Carter Sharer’s Youtube channel is quite entertaining.

holidays.title: Dwight Yoakam’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dwight Yoakam has been in the industry for years and has achieved a variety of accolades.

holidays.title: Johnny Carson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Carson's charisma and confidence earned him a legendary status in the T.V. world.

holidays.title: LaVar Ball’s Birthday
holidays.description: This businessman rose to prominence through his business ventures, athletic career, and numerous public appearances.

holidays.title: Masiela Lusha’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's an award-winning actress and gifted author with an impressive body of work.

holidays.title: Meghan McCain’s Birthday
holidays.description: From being a host to an author to a columnist, Meghan McCain has done it all.

holidays.title: Miguel’s Birthday
holidays.description: This versatile R&B vocalist won the Grammy for ‘Best R&B Song’ in 2013!

holidays.title: Mina Sundwall’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fans are in for an enjoyable read as we learn all about this exceptional actress.

holidays.title: Nathalie Paris’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paris is an amazing entertainer who is always a delight to watch.

holidays.title: Pelé’s Birthday
holidays.description: He set several records in football, some of which are still unbeaten.

holidays.title: Ryan Reynolds’s Birthday
holidays.description: Reynolds was a football player for nine years and now has smitten the world with movies.

holidays.title: Sam Andrews’s Birthday
holidays.description: Young and entertaining, he’s the people’s favorite! Celebrate his day with us!

holidays.title: Ur Mom Ashley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young social media star is winning hearts with her cute antics and interesting content.

holidays.title: Weird Al Yankovic’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has four Grammy Awards to his credit for creating music that furthers pop culture music.
